topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532c807b63687239dfee0000#post_532c807b63687239dfee0000
I was mainly joking, but personally I'm not really all that big of a fan of fallout anymore cause the plot has it's head up it's ass and is just one of those video games that are good for time killers but you shouldn't use your brain to think about.

I don't mean that as a "it sucks" way; rather the immediate problem the game creators had when coming up with the story is that they thought the entire world only consists of usa, china and russia.
"Australia?  What's that?  Sounds like a condiment for hotdogs"
"Most of the deaths would come from famine due to the sun being blocked out for years?  Nah uh magic radiation would kill everyone"

FEMA has even done projetions on radiations maps
!http://www.acceleratingfuture.com/michael/blog/images/fallout.jpg!
and yeah fallout 3 massively has it's head up it's butt cause those red areas would never bounce back.





If a nuclear war happened everyone in the southern hemisphere and underdeveloped countries not directly downwind of nuked countries would be laughing at our stupidity.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Realize for a minute you're taking a game seriously. Then think for a moment on exactly how seriously this is.

Of course it's bullshit. But it's fun bullshit. Like TF2's general story-line. It's fun bullshit. Fallout is fun bullshit that gives you an excuse to split someone's head in two as part of your post-apocalyptic fantasy. Like playing DayZ for the banditry and survival, and zombies are just as bullshit - if not more so - as nuclear Armageddon.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532c893d63687221d2b40000#post_532c893d63687221d2b40000
Well obviously; it's just that they ask us to take the game story super cereal and within the first five minutes make it goofy as can be.

It'd be like if tf2 instead of having those fun silly trailers had gruff voice overs about the atrocities of war and gave a long ass philosophical speech, or if a clown walked into a business meeting laid his brief case on the table and asked people to take him seriously then honked his nose and took a rubber chicken out of the briefcase.

"A gallon?"
"A literal gallon; out of a milk jug.  I don't even know where he got it from.  He never leaves the"
"Kami need you to tell me I can leave the lookout if I want to"
"Mr popo you may leave the lookout if you-"
"Bitch don't tell me what to do!"

News:
Michigan just struck down their gay marriage ban.  Yeah, it's pretty much a given at this point it'll eventually happen nationally; it's just a question of how long opponents are going to desperately cling on trying to stop it.

topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532cda546368724469400000#post_532cda546368724469400000
What is pretty much happening over here is the people that normally just fling piles of money to get what they want but don't actually have a plan don't understand why they're losing;
"Shit shit shit!  We keep throwing money to try to keep gay marriage illegal, but it's not working!  I know what we should do!  Throw more money!"

A couple of the cases the lawyers for trying to keep the gay marriage bans even admitted that they had no real plan and didn't have any real legal justification for keeping the plan.  You know a ban is going to get eventually repealed when even the lawyers in favor of the ban can't even come up with legal justification.

During the DOMA hearing in the supreme court everyone started laughing at the guy cause the judges even asked him if he had any legal ground for the ban and he responded that he didn't.

It'd be like someone walking into a court case and saying they're going to represent someone and the judge asks them what qualifications they have and they respond by saying that cause they have money.

A more funny analogy is that imagine a chess competition and someone comes in with no real understanding of how chess works and then slams a hundred dollars on the table asking for them to let them win then they follow it up with asking "So what's the name for the horsie?"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
